title: Green Vegetable Curry
directions: In a large skillet or wok, heat oil over medium-high. Add curry paste and cook, stirring, until fragrant, 30 seconds. Add mushrooms, asparagus, carrots, ginger, bok choy, and bell pepper and cook 5 minutes. Add coconut milk and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and cook at a rapid simmer 8 to 10 minutes. Serve over rice, topped with basil.
ingredients: 1/2 pound shiitake mushrooms, stems trimmed, halved if large
1/2 pound asparagus, trimmed and cut in half crosswise
4 heads baby bok choy (6 ounces), halved lengthwise
1 red bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces
Fresh basil leaves, torn if large
